description: A toggle component for selecting one value from a range of options. This is equivalent to a radio button group. It can be styled as a Toggle or as Radio buttons.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the radio button group.

props.name: value
props.description: The key of the selected option.

props.name: model
props.description: The list of options to present to the user.

props.name: toggleStyle
props.description: The style of toggle to display to the user.

props.name: orientation
props.description: The orientation of the toggle if the style is a radio button group.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether or not the toggle is disabled.

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when the selected value changes.
